amendment.description: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permit a 100 percent levy for payments to Federal vendors relating to property, to require a study on how to reduce the amount of Federal taxes owed but not paid by Federal contractors, and to make certain improvements in the laws relating to the employment and training of veterans.

action.text: Amendment SA 927 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Tester.
Amendment SA 927 as modified, under the order of 11/8/2011, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94 - 1. Record Vote Number: 203.
